short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate Article File Name based on article title, authors, and year

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension parses information on an article website and generate a file name for this article based on title, author names, and published year. Users are allowed to customize the format of the file name with pre-defined variables.

For more information, visit https://github.com/flcong/get-article-file-name
